Package cetus.hir

Class IfStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.hir.Statement
      • cetus.hir.IfStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotatable, Printable, Traversable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class IfStatement
extends Statement
    Represents a if statement in C programs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IfStatement

        public IfStatement​(Expression condition,
                   Statement true_clause)
        Create an if statement that has no else clause. Any true_clause that is not a compound statement is normalized to a compound statement.
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition tested by the statement.
        true_clause - The code to execute if the condition is true.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if condition or true_clause is null.
        NotAnOrphanException - if condition or true_clause has a parent.

      • IfStatement

        public IfStatement​(Expression condition,
                   Statement true_clause,
                   Statement false_clause)
        Create an if statement that has an else clause. true_clause and false_clause are normalized to compound statements.
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition tested by the statement.
        true_clause - The code to execute if the condition is true.
        false_clause - The code to execute if the condition is false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if condition, true_clause, or false_clause is null.
        NotAnOrphanException - if condition, true_clause, or false_clause has a parent.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultPrint

        public static void defaultPrint​(IfStatement s,
                                java.io.PrintWriter o)
        Prints an if statement to a stream.
        Parameters:
        s - The statement to print.
        o - The wirter on which to print the statement.

      • getControlExpression

        public Expression getControlExpression()
        Returns the expression used as a branch condition.

      • setControlExpression

        public void setControlExpression​(Expression cond)
        Sets the condition expression with the specified new condition.
        Parameters:
        cond - the new condition expression.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if cond is null.
        NotAnOrphanException - if cond has a parent.

      • getThenStatement

        public Statement getThenStatement()
        Returns the then clause of the if statement.

      • setThenStatement

        public void setThenStatement​(Statement stmt)
        Sets the then clause with the specified new statement. stmt is normalized to a compound statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - the new statement for the then clause.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if stmt is null.
        NotAnOrphanException - if stmt has a parent.

      • getElseStatement

        public Statement getElseStatement()
        Returns the false clause of the if statement.
        Returns:
        the false clause or null (if it does not exist).

      • setElseStatement

        public void setElseStatement​(Statement stmt)
        Sets the else clause with the specified new statement. stmt is normalized to a compound statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt - the new statement for the else clause.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if stmt is null.
        NotAnOrphanException - if stmt has a parent.

      • setClassPrintMethod

        public static void setClassPrintMethod​(java.lang.reflect.Method m)
        Overrides the class print method, so that all subsequently created objects will use the supplied method.
        Parameters:
        m - The new print method.

      • clone

        public IfStatement clone()
        Returns a clone of the if statement.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Statement
